contact.heading: Contact
contact.messageMeText: Want to discuss your custom cutting board or kitchen knife project? Shoot me an email or give me a call, and let's chat!

checkout.heading: Checkout
checkout.orderInfo1: Below you can choose whether you want to have your order sent to you, or if you prefer to pick it up at our workshop, and which payment method you prefer. We will notify you by email when your order has been shipped or is available for pickup. If you have any comments or requests on the order, enter this in the 'Message' field during checkout.
checkout.orderInfo2: Payment is available via Swish, card and cash (card and cash payment is only available for pickup orders). In case of delivery via postal package, we will manually send a payment request via Swish to the phone number you specified when ordering. For those who choose pickup, it is perfectly fine to pay with your preferred payment method at the time of delivery.
checkout.orderInfo3: Got questions or need assistance? Call us or send an email our way, we're happy to help.
checkout.cartEmpty: Add items to your cart before proceeding to checkout.

form.subject: New message from {{name}} via contact form on tobiasbergstedt.se

confirmationMail.subject: Order confirmation from Handmade by Bergstedt
confirmationMail.deliveryOrderReceived: We have received your order, and will send a mail your way as soon as it's been packed and is on it's way to you. Please review the information below, and contact us as soon as possible if you have any questions or if something is wrong.
confirmationMail.pickupOrderReceived: We have received your order, and will send a mail your way as soon as it's ready for pickup. Please review the information below, and contact us as soon as possible if you have any questions or if something is wrong.
confirmationMail.rightOfWithdrawalText: If you regret your purchase, you always have a 14-day right of withdrawal. The cancellation period starts from the day you receive the item, and the item needs to be unused or in an unchanged condition for us to issue a full credit.

start.title: Custom Wood Creations
start.description: Selected works and latest news from our workshop, as well as an overview of upcoming events.

gallery.title: All our creations
gallery.description: Here you can view all our creations, everything from kitchen knives and kitchen utensils to rocking horses and furniture.

shop.title: For sale
shop.description: Everything currently for sale from us at Handmade by Bergstedt. Knives, kitchen utensils, cutting boards, furniture.

custom.title: 3D Cutting Board Configurator/Designer
custom.description: 3d engine to customize cutting boards according to your wishes and preferences. Choose pattern, appearance, size and materials from a multitude of options.

about.title: More information about us at
about.description: Read more about us, how we got started with our craft and what our customers think of us.

contact.title: Contact us at
contact.description: Our contact information and address, as well as a contact form for easy communication.

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.description: Confirm your order, and have the products delivered shortly.

orderConfirmation.title: Order confirmation
